panels.description: Stacked view from Nodes on which we can not schedule any pods
panels.title: Unschedulable Nodes

panels.description:
Number of times a pod was in a bad state. 
In case of
- Evicted : a Pod assigned to a Node was asked for termination
- NodeAffinity : issue with Pod restricted to run on particular Node
- NodeLost : issue with Pod while running on a Node which was lost
- Shutdown : issue with Pod while shutdown 
- UnexpectedAdmissionError : Pod unexpected error while attempting to recover from admission failure
panels.title: Bad Pod Status

panels.description: Number of times a container was restarted per hour (with filtering only the ones that restarted at least 5 times in an hour which is abnormal)
panels.title: Restarting Containers per Hour

panels.description:
Number of times a container was in Terminated state. 
In case of
- OOMKilled : click on the graph serie and drill down to Pods dash. 
- Error : check that the pod is in not ready state, it means the readiness probe failed. 
- Evicted : click on the graph serie and drill down to Node Resource VS Limits dash.

links.title: Drill down to Node Resource VS Limits

panels.title: Terminated Containers

panels.description:
Number of times a container was in Waiting state. 
In case of
- CrashLoopBackOff : The application inside the container keeps crashing or some type of parameters of the pod or container have been configured incorrectly 
- CreateContainerConfigError : most of the time due to a volume mounting issue. 
- CreateContainerError : check an issue with the OCP control plane. 
- ErrImagePull/ImagePullBackOff/InvalidImageName : issue with the docker Image to be pulled
panels.title: Waiting Containers

panels.description: Number of times a container was not in Ready state.
panels.title: Not Ready Containers

title: Cluster Pod & Node Issues
